dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- JMCA
dmca.body:
JMCA ENTERPRISES
PMB # 375
511 Ave of Americas
New York, NY 10011
Amberphoria2@hotmail.com

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints

11/07/06

Re. Copyright Infringement of song Amber feat Sweet Rains "Melt with the sun"


To whom it may concern,

We have a good faith belief and KNOW that the use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by us as we are the copyright and master owners.

We swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner and am authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

You guys know DAMN well that your server is used to
do just that. As long as you get to charge for the accounts- you just
do not care. Look how many files are posted on your servers!!!

If this is not taken down within 24 hours- we will take legal steps.

This is the blog spot link: http://theafterhoursblog.blogspot.com/

And you will find it under this post:

http://theafterhoursblog.blogspot.com/2006/11/grigay-mix.html

The Frigay Mix
Peter Presta Presents Stephen Seidita - Doom [Peter Presta Mix]
Starkillers featuring Gina - [Can U] Scream [Kobba/Leeds Remix]
Janet Jackson featuring Khia - So Excited [Alexander/Mark VDH Remix]
Kate Bush - Rubberband [Lexicon Avenue Remix]
Offer Nissim featuring Ivri Lider - Nights In White Satin [Original Mix]
Beyonce - Ring The Alarm [Freemasons Remix]
Amber - Melt With The Sun [Tracy Young Remix]
Christina Aguilera - Hurt [Jonathan Peters Main Mix]

Sincerely,

Marie-Claire Cremers

CEO JMCA Enterprises LLC
Contact: Amberphoria2@aol.com
